    • DWR Publication Classification using an LLM

Package index

Retrieval functions

Functions for retrieving publication and funder metadata from CrossRef.

get_funded()
Retrieve publications funded by a specific funder
get_funder_info()
Search for funder information in the CrossRef Funder Registry
get_pubs()
Retrieve publication metadata from CrossRef

Data cleaning functions

Functions for cleaning and standardizing publication metadata.

clean_crossref_result()
Clean and filter Crossref API results
clean_doi()
Clean and standardize DOIs
clean_jats_abstracts()
Clean JATS XML abstracts
clean_text()
Clean and escape text for BibTeX entries
extract_author_info()
Extract author information from publication metadata
extract_year_vectorized()
Extract publication year from various date fields
search_cols()
Search for Pattern Across All Columns in a Data Frame

Formatting and classification functions

Functions for formatting citations and classifying publications.

classify_pubs_gemini()
Classify publications using Google's Gemini LLM
create_bibtex()
Create BibTeX entry from publication data
format_bibtex_authors()
Format author information for BibTeX entries
format_citation()
Format citation in various academic styles
format_agu()
Format citation in AGU style
format_apa()
Format citation in APA style
format_chicago()
Format citation in Chicago style
format_nature()
Format citation in Nature style
format_science()
Format citation in Science style
